mapper.select: select * from cate_key order by cate_key_idx asc
select cate_value_name from cate_value where cate_key_idx=#{cate_key_idx} order by cate_value_idx asc
select * from cate_value where cate_key_idx=#{cate_key_idx} order by cate_value_idx asc
select area_name from area where area_lev=2 and parent_idx=#{area_idx}

select rev_idx from (select rownum rn, rev_idx from (select rev_idx
from (select rev_like.* from rev_like, (select rev_idx from review, (select reserve_idx from reservation, (select store_idx from store where store_addr like '%'||#{cityWord}||'%'||#{unitWord}||'%')a where reservation.store_idx=a.store_idx)b where review.reserve_idx=b.reserve_idx)c where rev_like.rev_idx=c.rev_idx)
from rev_like
group by rev_idx order by count(*) desc)) where rn between 1 and 3

select c.*, user_nickname, profile_image from (select b.*, store_name, store_addr from (select a.*, user_idx, store_idx, reserve_date from (select * from review where rev_idx=#{rev_idx})a, reservation where a.reserve_idx=reservation.reserve_idx)b, store where store.store_idx=b.store_idx)c, user_profile where user_profile.user_idx=c.user_idx
select nvl(round(avg, 2),0) from (select avg(rev_score) avg from (select review.*, store_idx from review, reservation where review.reserve_idx=reservation.reserve_idx and store_idx=#{store_idx}))a
select count(*) from follow where following_idx=#{user_idx}
select count(*) from rev_like where rev_idx=#{rev_idx}
select cate_value_name from cate_value where cate_value_idx=#{cate_value_idx}
select * from banner where banner_stat=1 and #{todate} between banner_sdate and banner_edate order by banner_order asc
